subject: AM Brief: Thu, 29 Feb 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. USD strengthened amid concerns over New Taiwan Dollar.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 15:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Kuhn Inc downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Collum solio hic quaerat absens officia cibo deorsum.
- AFR: Civitas ratione audio adhuc tepesco antea.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for NPF
body:
Thomas,

Client instruction just came down. We need to hedge our exposure to the BHP position.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888
